issue.title: buildings not showing up in MapQuery

content.raw: I have attached what I see from gazebo when running with complete_10.world. It is only a portion since zooming out further causes the image to go gray but it is enough to indicate that terrain.png does not match what I am seeing in the gui. I am under the impression that the bounds returned from SearchArea correspond to the edges of the world shown in gazebo. Is that not the case?
content.html: I have attached what I see from gazebo when running with complete_10.world. It is only a portion since zooming out further causes the image to go gray but it is enough to indicate that terrain.png does not match what I am seeing in the gui. I am under the impression that the bounds returned from SearchArea correspond to the edges of the world shown in gazebo. Is that not the case?
